channel.title: Webhost Problems
channel.description:
Hi Guys, I recently bought a 1 year Kings webhost from Mi-Webs.
And ever since the 3th day my site's gone down due to unknown reasons. David(owner of Mi-webs) told me that it was probably a directed Ddos attack on my webhost. The bad thing is, I have a vote4points set up so when my webhost goes down, my server cmd is spammed with the following error : "IO Exception in checkvotes ( String Playername )"
This makes it so the server's engine load goes through the roof and nobody can log in....
Anyone have an idea to fix this and stop the ddos's?
Any help would be appreciated since this happens like four times a day.

item.title: Webhost Problems
item.dc:creator: @CombustionXOwner CombustionXOwner
item.description:
@CombustionXOwner wrote:

Rile0120:

Does any error pop-up in your cmd box?

No, but that error has subsided, now I have another one which is not related. Some people can connect to my website and some Can’t… I don’t understand what’s going on.

Read full topic

item.title: Webhost Problems
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

Does any error pop-up in your cmd box?

Read full topic

item.title: Webhost Problems
item.dc:creator: @CombustionXOwner CombustionXOwner
item.description:
@CombustionXOwner wrote:

I removed my vote4points system server-sided, and now people get an error connecting problem 3-5 times before being able to log in?.. Never seen this before.

Read full topic

item.title: Webhost Problems
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

After you catch the IOException thrown by your ‘checkVotes’ method, you shouldn’t try to connect again for a certain amount of time, probably at least a few minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Webhost Problems
item.dc:creator: @CombustionXOwner CombustionXOwner
item.description:
@CombustionXOwner wrote:

Rile0120:

Simply disable the vote4points for a little while till you fix your hosting problems…

Yeah the problem is I dont know what’s wrong with the webhosting.

Read full topic

item.title: Webhost Problems
item.dc:creator: @CombustionXOwner CombustionXOwner
item.description:
@CombustionXOwner wrote:

Hi Guys, I recently bought a 1 year Kings webhost from Mi-Webs.

And ever since the 3th day my site’s gone down due to unknown reasons. David(owner of Mi-webs) told me that it was probably a directed Ddos attack on my webhost. The bad thing is, I have a vote4points set up so when my webhost goes down, my server cmd is spammed with the following error : “IO Exception in checkvotes ( String Playername )”

This makes it so the server’s engine load goes through the roof and nobody can log in…

Anyone have an idea to fix this and stop the ddos’s?

Any help would be appreciated since this happens like four times a day.

Read full topic
